body_html:
This is now updated with PR comments a few notes:

  • RefCounted was renamed to Retainable because refcounted_list is grammatically ambiguous.
  • TensorTemporary is no longer a subclass of Tensor, because it can lead to unsafe code when structure slicing occurs. It is now its own object that manages the lifetime of a special temporary tensor.
  • all places where Retainables move around are now done through functions that describe the ownership transfer semantics taking place.
body_text:
This is now updated with PR comments a few notes:

RefCounted was renamed to Retainable because refcounted_list is grammatically ambiguous.
TensorTemporary is no longer a subclass of Tensor, because it can lead to unsafe code when structure slicing occurs. It is now its own object that manages the lifetime of a special temporary tensor.
all places where Retainables move around are now done through functions that describe the ownership transfer semantics taking place.
body:
This is now updated with PR comments a few notes:

* RefCounted was renamed to Retainable because refcounted_list is grammatically ambiguous.
* TensorTemporary is no longer a subclass of Tensor, because it can lead to unsafe code when structure slicing occurs. It is now its own object that manages the lifetime of a special temporary tensor.
* all places where Retainables move around are now done through functions that describe the ownership transfer semantics taking place.
